ctx: destruct (Rbar_mult' l (Rbar_mult a l)) as [l' | ] eqn:E.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros H_lim. unfold is_lim in H_lim. unfold is_lim. intros eps. unfold Rbar_locally. unfold filterlim. intros P H_P. unfold Rbar_mult. destruct (Rbar_mult' l (Rbar_mult a l)) as [l' | ] eqn:E. - specialize (H_lim (pos_div_2 eps)). destruct H_lim as [delta H_delta]. exists delta. intros y H_dist. apply H_delta. unfold Rbar_locally. exists (mkposreal _ (pos_div_2 eps)). intros z H_z. apply H_P. rewrite <- E in H_dist. eapply Rbar_mult_correct. apply H_z. apply H_dist. - exists 1. intros z H_dist. apply E.
